name: LEGO® Marvel Super Heroes 2 - Cloak and Dagger
detailed_description: Download this level and character pack to play as Cloak and Dagger! Set immediately after Cloak and Dagger gain their incredible powers, players must help the two escape their evil captor, his super powered henchman, and work together through a series of puzzles using their unique new abilities.
about_the_game: Download this level and character pack to play as Cloak and Dagger! Set immediately after Cloak and Dagger gain their incredible powers, players must help the two escape their evil captor, his super powered henchman, and work together through a series of puzzles using their unique new abilities.
short_description: Download this level and character pack to play as Cloak and Dagger! Set immediately after Cloak and Dagger gain their incredible powers, players must help the two escape their evil captor, his super powered henchman, and work together through a series of puzzles.
supported_languages:
English*, French*, Italian*, German*, Spanish*, Arabic, Danish, Dutch, Japanese*, Korean, Portuguese-Brazil*, Russian, Traditional Chinese, Polish*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-3240 (2 * 3400) or equivalent, AMD Athlon X4 740 (2 * 3200) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 460 (1024 MB), Intel Iris Pro 5200 (shared), Radeon HD 5850 (1024 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/8.1/10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4570T (2*2900) or equivalent, AMD FX-6350 (6 * 3900) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti (2048 MB), Radeon HD 7970 (3072 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
